code: import{addHours,getCurrentTime}from"../time/addHours";import{timeZoneOffset}from"../constant";export function getTimeHourly(dateString,addedHours){var date=addHours(timeZoneOffset,new Date(dateString));return String(date.getHours()+addedHours).padStart(2,"0")+":00";}export function getTimeDaily(addedDays){var usedDate=getCurrentTime(24*addedDays);var day=usedDate.substring(8,10);var month=usedDate.substring(5,7);return day+"."+month;}
